Description: Godin Black A6 Ultra Electric Acoustic Guitar with Fender Gig Bag Guitar is in very good working condition. We purchased this guitar in used condition in 2017.Based on serial number, year of manufacture was 2014. Serial number is 14125188 Used lightly for solo performances and in home studio. The acoustic & electric mix provides tons of tonal possibilitiesAll electronics work as intended and appear to be stock electronics (i.e. no modifications)Includes two 1/4" inputs, one for acoustic only (and acoustic/electric blending mode) and one for electric tones (neck humbucker)The acoustic tones are bright and clear, the electric tones mellow & warm. Lots of options with blending the tones and adding effectsDeluxe Fender gig bag is in very good condition and fits very well. Despite the minor cosmetic blemishes, it's in perfect working order and has a ton of life left. The body has some scuffs, scratches & swirling on the face & back of the body There are some nicks & a couple small dings in the back of the neck, but nothing that affects playability Headstock is clean and in good shape, tuners all work as intended Guitar will ship de-tuned a guitar box with ample padding for a safe journeyNo 9V battery included in shipment, one is needed for the electronics to function
Title: Godin A6 A 6 Ultra Electric Acoustic Guitar Black with Deluxe Fender Gig Bag
ConditionDescription: Guitar is in good used condition.  It shows some scuffs, scratches & swirling on the face & back of the body, but only up close.  There are some nicks & a couple small dings in the back of the neck, but nothing that affects playability.  Headstock is clean and in good shape, tuners all work as intended.  Electronics & controls are all in perfect working condition.  The Fender gig bag is in very good to excellent shape.  All zippers work perfectly and it closes securely.
